main event: A civilian ship reported an unidentified aerial phenomenon described as a planet moving at high speed over the Atlantic Ocean on November 6, 1953.
interesting points: The observation lasted for four minutes.,The object was seen at a high altitude.,No physical evidence was reported.,The sighting was evaluated as an astronomical phenomenon by officials.,The phenomenon was regarded as normal unless further investigation indicated otherwise.
sighted object: an unidentified light described as a planet
